679.76.text: And, you work for CBeebies and you present a programme

696.16.text: I think there's a really exciting thing about being in the kitchen

699.36.text: and making mess and it's really engaging

702.04.text: and they can use their hands and pretty much every child I meet

705.32.text: who watches my show goes into the kitchen and cooks

708.16.text: after watching it, which is great, so they're not just sitting

710.80.text: watching television, it's actually empowering them

713.32.text: to go and do something, which is great.

715.12.text: Except that their mothers curse you while they go

717.24.text: and clean the kitchen for three hours afterwards.

943.40.text: Now, it's fascinating how you became an actor

945.60.text: because you were a rather bad boy, weren't you?

947.96.text:
- You kept bunking off school?

950.20.text: They sent you to some sort of club,

953.40.text: hoping you would improve but you left there one afternoon

962.56.text: Yeah, it was a bit crazy.

963.84.text: I just walked round the corner one day,

965.92.text: saw a big group of people and didn't really know what's going on.

968.72.text: I thought, is there a fight or what's going on? I didn't know.

971.44.text: I went running over and I remember meeting Des Hamilton,

973.80.text: a casting director for Shane Meadows,

979.72.text: I'll never be in a film.

981.20.text: I'm from this rough estate, I never thought anything of it

986.64.text: I want a fiver for my time. So I charged him to audition.

990.28.text: I can just imagine it now.

- from the media point of view.

1659.84.text: Let's have a look at the scores - in joint third place,

1662.16.text: seven points apiece, Katy and Thomas.

1687.04.text:
- Well done. 
- Thank you! 
- Well, you did brilliantly. 
- Thank you so much.

1690.96.text: The Pope hasn't got one of those.

1692.36.text: The Pope hasn't got one of those, no, but I have.

1694.40.text:
- I'm delighted with that, thank you. 
- So you should be.

1696.64.text: You don't have to be a celebrity to take part
